Name: Retail
Description: Customers who buy products for personal use

Name: Wholesale
Description: Customers who buy in bulk for resale

Name: Loyalty Program
Description: Customers enrolled in a rewards program

Name: Corporate
Description: Companies purchasing on behalf of employees

Name: Walk-in
Description: Customers who visit the physical store

Name: Healthcare
Description: Hospitals and clinics purchasing medical supplies

Name: Export
Description: Customers who buy for international markets

Name: Subscription
Description: Customers on a recurring purchase plan
